issue.title: [7.3.0] .blazerc mentioned (wrong filename) on import error at bazel startup

milestone.title: 7.3.0 release blockers
milestone.description: Issues that should be fixed before 7.3.0 release.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.title: [7.3.0] Use the generic term "config file" instead of the product-specific ".blazerc" in error messages.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 7.3.0 RC1](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.3.0rc1). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting `USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.3.0rc1`. Thanks!
